notesStmt.note: Translation by William Whittingham of: Summa totius Christianismi.
Running title reads: A briefe declaration of predestination.
In two parts; part 2 formerly STC 11891.
Part 2, "A briefe treatise of election and reprobation", has separate dated title page.
Part 2 identified as STC 11891 on UMI microfilm reel 1546.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 1438 #7 (part 1 only), and at reel 1546 ø (part 2 only, identifed as STC 11891). Bodleian Library copy filmed twice.
